products.title: Napa Blackout Citrus Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Elegant and fashion forward, the napa blackout range is a luxuriously striped fabric. Choose between contemporary tones to get the perfect fit for your home. Napa blackout fabric offers complete light blocking properties, ensuring complete light control for your space. products.description: The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. A stunning mustard yellow shade, great to pair with cool greys & deep navy hues. products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Contemporary and stylish, their moisture-resistant splash mellow yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. This pastel yellow electric roller is a beautiful, warm-toned colour which will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space. At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This bright sunny yellow electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Mellow Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This pastel mellow yellow electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Musa Saffron Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Make an eye-catching update with the musa saffron electric roller blind. This blind features a stylised graphic that is warm and zesty and is a great way to add some colour to your space. The simple fabric print is simple yet vibrant and is great for a modern minimalist space with an accent colour. The electric design enables quick and easy remote control. Product id: db-erbx2025 fabric colour: saffron yellow material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes musa saffron yellow electric roller blind in yellow.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The warm, golden hues of this electric roller blind will definitely catch the eye. Boheme pvc blackout summer yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, its a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.

products.title: Avoca Alya Peach Gold Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Update your window covering to a sleek electric roller blind that will make shading and decorating any space super easy. The avoca alya electric roller blind provides quick and smart natural light control to enhance privacy and comfort in your home. This design features a printed fabric blind decorated with a tasteful botanical pattern in quiet, neutral colours. products.title: Willow Blackout Brazen Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Add a delicate touch of decoration to your windows and complement a modern scheme with this print of willow branches in soft grey and yellow tones. The willow brazen yellow blackout electric roller blind will have a positive and peaceful effect on a space thanks to the soothing design and blackout fabric. The electric aspect of this model ensures a swift and easy operation whenever you need to adjust the blind.
